name: Lunar Revolution (tedAgriogianis)
description:
A rebellion is brewing in the lunar system. The moons of the Solar System have grown tired of living in their planet's orbit and decided to rebel. Luna, Earth's moon, has learned of this conspiracy, and goes to Sol, the Sun goddess, for help. Together, they seek out the moons to put down the revolution and restore order to the Solar System. In their way are the enigmatic and ever-present Dark Matter monsters patrolling the cosmos.

Controls:

Sol:

Z - Light Attack

Hold X - Charge Attack

C - Projectile

V - Revive Luna

Left Shift - Dash

Luna:

I - Light Attack

Hold O - Charge Attack

P - Projectile

Hold L - Shield

K - Revive Sol

Right Shift - Dash
